oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Groundbreaking of the Lentz Center, Nashville, Tennessee, 1958 June
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photo related to the groundbreaking of the John J. Lentz Health Center on 23rd Avenue, North, officiated with Nashville Mayor West and County Judge Briley and other dignitaries, circa June 1958. Dr. John J. Lentz was director of Health for the Davidson County Health Department. The new facility became the main clinic for public health activities of Nashville and Davidson County, located at 311 23rd Avenue N. Dr. Lentz started his career as a country doctor in 1906 and became director of public health for Davidson County in December, 1920. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lentz, John J.; Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980; West, Ben, 1911-1974
